definition: Can achieve task/skill/activity with no support in a familiar situation. May still require known structure/sequence to achieve with no support. Show full awareness of task/skill/activity.
Shows momentsof independence. May still require prompting. May use iniative at times. Takes known next steps without prompting. May imitate modelling.
Shows awareness of the task/skill/activity. May respond with prompting. May not show initiative. May require lots of structure, modelling, repitition throughout task/skill/activity.
Proficient. Confidently completes task/activity, uses skill. Can achieve in a nuber of situations independently. Show full awareness. Structure/sequence may be flexible.

Used mainly for MOE  data reporting. If an IEP goal is being assessed as not achieved be the mid-year point the goal will be reviewed. Shows little/no awareness of requirements/expectations. Shows little/no ability or understanding.
